data.text: Eka Zofar ja-Namath nodwoko ni,
“Weche miwacho mathothgi bende nyalo kadho nono mak odwoki adier?
Wechegi manonogo bende nyalo hoyo ji malingʼ?
Ere gima omiyo iwachone Nyasaye ni, ‘An giyie makare
To mano kaka daher
mondo omi onyisi yore mopondo mag rieko,
“Bende inyalo ngʼeyo weche mopondo mag Nyasaye?
Giboyo moyombo polo, koro in to ditimie angʼo?
Bor margi oyombo bor mar piny
“Ka onyalo biro sani mi otweyi e od twech
Adier, oneno joma wuondore;
Ka nyathi punda inyalo nywol ka muol,
“Kata kamano ka ichiworine
bende ka iweyo timo richo
eka inyalo bedo thuolo kionge gi wichkuot
Adier wiyi nowil gi chandruokni,
Ngimani nobed maler moloyo ler mar odiechiengʼ,
Inidag gi kwe maonge luoro, nikech geno ma in-go,
Ininind kionge gi luoro,
To wenge joma timbegi richo biro jony
